transArray.content: The service attitude of the lady and brother at the front desk was very good, and they gave us a free upgrade. The room is clean and sanitary, and the intelligence is very advanced. And free oranges and orange cookies

The hotel's reply: We know each other as clear as water, as bright as a mirror, and our hearts are as clear as a mirror. I believe you must feel our sincerity and efforts. Your praise is our pride. We look forward to seeing you again.
